item.title: SAP 内部调查显示员工士气在重组中急剧下降
item.description: 据一项内部调查显示，随着首席执行官克里斯蒂安-克莱因（Christian Klein）推进一月份宣布的重组计划，SAP SE 在其本土市场正面临着员工不满情绪的膨胀。【原文：SAP SE is facing swelling discontent among employees in its home market, according to an internal survey, as Chief Executive Officer Christian Klein pushes through a restructuring plan announced in January.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第三周下降至两年来最低水平
item.description: 抵押贷款利率降至两年来的最低点，有助于推动购房者重返房地产市场。【原文：Mortgage rates dropped to the lowest in two years, helping push buyers back into the housing market.】

item.title: 英国推迟提供长效艾滋病预防药物
item.description: 英国药品定价监管机构拒绝推荐葛兰素史克公司（GSK Plc）的长效预防艾滋病注射剂，要求该公司提供更多数据，这一决定进一步推迟了该国患者获得这种药品的时间。【原文：England’s drug pricing regulator declined to recommend GSK Plc’s long-acting HIV prevention injection, asking the company for more data, in a decision that further delays access to the medicine for patients in the country.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席詹斯勒仍认为交易所注册存在监管空白
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会并没有放弃强制另类交易系统在该机构注册为经纪人的提议。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission isn’t giving up on a proposal to force alternative trading systems to register as brokers with the agency.】

item.title: 部长称加拿大缺乏人工智能框架 "令人尴尬
item.description: 加拿大工业部长表示，目前在通过人工智能框架方面面临的挑战对加拿大来说并不乐观。如果贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理的少数党政府比预期的更早倒台，那么这项法律甚至可能永远见不到阳光。【原文：Canada’s industry minister says ongoing challenges to adopt an artificial intelligence framework do not look good for the country. The law may never even see the light of day if Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s minority government falls sooner than expected.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，继兴登堡报告后，超微公司遭美国调查
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，超级微电脑公司正在接受美国司法部的调查，因为一份做空报告引发了对该公司会计实务的质疑。【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. is under investigation by the US Justice Department following a short-seller report that raised questions about the company’s accounting practices, the Wall Street Journal reported.】

item.title: OpenAI 可能会成为一家公益公司。这意味着什么？
item.description: OpenAI 的管理者正在权衡是否要将这家快速发展的人工智能先驱转变为一家公益公司（PBC），不再由其非盈利董事会控制。【原文：OpenAI’s managers are weighing whether to turn the fast-growing artificial intelligence pioneer into a public benefit corporation (PBC) that would no longer be controlled by its nonprofit board.】

item.title: 瑞银称墨西哥比索将因政治不确定性减弱而上涨
item.description: 据瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）称，随着投资者对新政府越来越放心，以及围绕美国大选的波动逐渐减弱，墨西哥比索将在明年上半年走强。【原文：Mexico’s peso is set to strengthen through the first half of next year as investors grow more comfortable with the new administration and volatility around the US election fades, according to UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 电气化主题 ETF 最新加入人工智能 "淘金热
item.description: 这是主题 ETF 投资热潮中的最新交易：搭上人工智能革命快车的能源公司。【原文：It’s the latest trade in the buzzy world of thematic ETF investing: Energy companies that are riding the AI revolution.】

item.title: Visa 通过购买功能空间加强人工智能反欺诈斗争
item.description: Visa 公司将收购实时人工智能支付保护公司 Featurespace Ltd.—；这是这家信用卡巨头加强欺诈和金融犯罪风险检测组合的最新举措。【原文：Visa Inc. will acquire real-time artificial intelligence payments protection firm Featurespace Ltd. — marking the credit-card giant’s latest move in bolstering its fraud and financial crime risk detection portfolio.】

item.title: OpenAI的阿尔特曼称高管离职与重组无关
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）表示，这家人工智能初创公司的高管离职与公司权衡向营利性结构转型时进行的重组无关。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman said that executive departures at the artificial intelligence startup were unrelated to a restructuring as the company weighs moving to a for-profit structure.】

item.title: 巴尔称美联储正在探索将流动性与未保险存款挂钩
item.description: 美国央行正在探索调整其流动性框架，包括寻求保护未投保储户的要求。【原文：The US central bank is exploring adjustments to its liquidity framework, including requirements that would seek to protect uninsured depositors.】

item.title: 雪佛龙同意赫斯首席执行官不加入董事会，与美国联邦贸易委员会达成协议
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.熟悉内情的人士说，作为与美国联邦贸易委员会达成的允许两家公司合并的协议的一部分，雪佛龙公司首席执行官约翰-赫斯（John Hess）不会加入该公司董事会。【原文：Chevron Corp. agreed that Hess Corp. Chief Executive Officer John Hess won’t join the company’s board as part of an agreement with the US Federal Trade Commission allowing the companies’ merger to proceed, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 意大利工业部长支持意大利联合信贷银行与德国商业银行的交易
item.description: 意大利工业部长阿道夫-乌尔索（Adolfo Urso）支持总部设在米兰的意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）收购德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG），这有可能使柏林和罗马之间的关系恶化。【原文：Italy’s Industry Minister Adolfo Urso backed a potential takeover of Commerzbank AG by Milan-based UniCredit SpA which has threatened to sour relations between Berlin and Rome.】

item.title: 花旗分析师认为裕信银行与德国商业银行的交易是大概率事件
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）分析师表示，尽管德国政府反对，但意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）和德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）仍有可能合并。【原文：A merger between UniCredit SpA and Commerzbank AG is likely, despite opposition from the German government, according to analysts at Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 腾讯是富途 2.06 亿美元大宗交易的卖方
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，腾讯控股有限公司是中国经纪平台运营商富途控股有限公司（Futu Holdings Ltd.）股票出售的幕后卖家。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. is the seller behind a share sale of Chinese brokerage-platform operator Futu Holdings Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter, the latest that takes advantage of improving market conditions after Beijing unveiled economic stimulus.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司与埃克森等公司就非洲勘探问题进行谈判
item.description: 巴西国有石油公司正在洽谈从埃克森美孚（ExxonMobil Corp.）、壳牌（Shell Plc）、道达尔能源（TotalEnergies SE）和 Equinor ASA 等公司购买非洲勘探区块的股份。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled oil company is in talks to buy stakes in African exploration blocks from companies including ExxonMobil Corp., Shell Plc, TotalEnergies SE and Equinor ASA.】

item.title: 波洛兹听取关于建立新基金以拉拢加拿大养老金管理者回国的建议
item.description: 前加拿大央行行长斯蒂芬-波洛兹（Stephen Poloz）正在研究一系列让加拿大养老基金更多地投资于国内经济的想法，其中包括建立一个集合基金，使其中一些基金更容易进行交易。【原文：Former Bank of Canada Governor Stephen Poloz is examining a list of ideas to get the country’s pension funds to invest more in the domestic economy – including the creation of a pooled fund that would make dealmaking easier for some of them.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行称 "重举 "已完成，纽约商业银行股价上涨
item.description: 纽约社区银行公司（New York Community Bancorp）从动荡的一年中恢复过来的过程还远未结束，但数月来努力改造这家贷款机构的工作可能终于有了回报。【原文：New York Community Bancorp’s recovery from a tumultuous year is far from over, but months of work spent trying to transform the lender may finally be paying off.】

item.title: 力拓力争十年前在亚利桑那州生产铜矿
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）首席执行官雅各布-斯陶霍尔姆（Jakob Stausholm）表示，力拓集团的目标是在十年前开始从亚利桑那州一个拖延已久的采矿项目中产出铜。【原文：Rio Tinto Plc aims to start churning out copper from a long-delayed mining project in Arizona by the end of the decade, according to Chief Executive Officer Jakob Stausholm.】

item.title: 中国寻求加强上市公司以吸引更多资金
item.description: 中国证券监管机构呼吁加快发展股权投资基金和保险资金，并提高上市公司质量，以吸引更多资金进入资本市场。【原文：China’s securities regulator called for the quick development of equity and insurance funds, and to strengthen the quality of listed companies to attract more funding into the capital market.】

item.title: 斯沃琪首席执行官称未实施私有化计划，股价飙升
item.description: 斯沃琪集团（Swatch Group AG）首席执行官尼克-海耶克（Nick Hayek）表示，目前还没有将这家钟表制造商私有化的计划，不过 "如果能这样做就好了"。【原文：Swatch Group AG Chief Executive Officer Nick Hayek said there are no plans underway to take the watchmaker private, although it’s something that “would be nice to do.”】

item.title: 尽管加息，尼日利亚奈拉对美元汇率仍创新低
item.description: 尼日利亚奈拉兑美元汇率跌至新低，在当地持续缺乏美元的情况下，奈拉摆脱了利率意外上调的影响。【原文：Nigeria’s naira fell to a fresh low against the dollar, shrugging off on a surprise interest-rate increase amid ongoing local scarcity of the US currency.】

item.title: 波兰政策制定者希望格拉平斯基的鸽派倾向能持续下去
item.description: 波兰政策制定者路德维克-科特奇（Ludwik Kotecki）表示，他希望货币政策委员会能在 2025 年初开始降息，而且行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）不会强硬地发表最近较为鸽派的言论。【原文：Polish policymaker Ludwik Kotecki said he hopes the Monetary Policy Council will start reducing interest rates in early 2025 and that Governor Adam Glapinski won’t harden his recently more dovish rhetoric.】

item.title: 美国私募股权公司总裁家族收购约克城足球俱乐部
item.description: 私募股权公司 General Atlantic 首席执行官比尔-福特（Bill E Ford）的家族办公室已成为拥有 102 年历史的英格兰约克城足球俱乐部（York City FC）的重要小股东。【原文：The family office of Bill E Ford, the chief executive officer of private equity firm General Atlantic, has emerged as a significant minority shareholder in York City FC, a 102-year-old English football team.】

item.title: 花旗集团与阿波罗联手 250 亿美元推进私人信贷业务
item.description: 花旗集团和阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc. and Apollo Global Management Inc. are teaming up in the fast-growing private credit market, agreeing to work together on $25 billion worth of deals over the next five years.】

item.title: 维珍媒体 O2 首席执行官确诊癌症后休假
item.description: 英国电信运营商维珍媒体 O2 首席执行官卢茨-许勒（Lutz Schüler）周四表示，在被诊断出患有前列腺癌后，将延长休假。【原文：Virgin Media O2 Chief Executive Officer Lutz Schüler is taking extended leave after being diagnosed with prostate cancer, the British telecom operator said on Thursday.】

item.title: 印度维持借贷，摩根大通银行的加入刺激了债务需求
item.description: 印度政府维持了本财年剩余时间的借贷计划，因为在全球债务包容的刺激下，外资流入强劲。【原文：India’s government maintained its borrowing plan for the remainder of this fiscal year amid robust foreign inflows spurred by global debt inclusion.】

item.title: Eskom 的涨价要求有望带来债券收益和客户压力
item.description: 南非 Eskom 控股有限公司（Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.）正在寻求大幅提高电价，这对其债权人来说是个好消息，但对客户来说却是个痛苦，而且可能会影响该国的经济增长。【原文：South Africa’s Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. is seeking a jumbo electricity price hike, spelling good news for its creditors but pain for customers and possible fallout for the country’s economic growth.】

item.title: 波兰亿万富翁家族纠纷引发 Cyfrowy 跌幅创纪录
item.description: Cyfrowy Polsat SA 的股价即将创下有史以来的最大单日跌幅，因为有报道披露，其亿万富翁创始人的家族内部正在争夺这家波兰媒体、能源和电信集团的控制权。【原文：Cyfrowy Polsat SA shares are on track for their largest daily loss ever after a report revealed infighting within the family of its billionaire founder over control of the Polish media, energy and telecoms group.】
